dcterms:description: The MIMIC-III dataset is sourced from the Medical Information Mart for Intensive Care (MIMIC), containing anonymized electronic health records (EHRs) from patients admitted to the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center in Boston, MA, USA, from 2001 to 2012. It includes information on hospital stays, laboratory measurements, medications administered, and vital signs, specifically focusing on ICU patients.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III dataset

dcterms:description: The PIC dataset is a pediatric-specific intensive care database that comprises information relating to children admitted to critical care units at the Childrenâ€™s Hospital, Zhejiang University School of Medicine. It has a similar structure to the MIMIC-III dataset but is smaller in size.
dcterms:title: PIC (Pediatric Intensive Care) dataset
